abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of three parts: (a)
            the construction, furnishing and equipping of an extension
            of the National Teacher Education Center, a new secondary
            school, extensions to ten secondary schools and extensions
            to a technical school and a technical and commercial school;
            (b) the provision and equipping of eight mobile units for
            farmer training; and (c) technical assistance for project
            implementation, teacher training and curriculum development.
